EU lawmakers endorse political deal on artificial intelligence rulesEU lawmakers on Wednesday endorsed a provisional agreement on artificial intelligence(AI) rules, the world's first legislation to set guardrails on a technology used in banking, internet-connected devices, smart homes and cars. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 11:22:09 GMT ZUNGXOSF4JPO7MOFZKF4T4ZJB4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/eu-lawmakers-endorse-political-deal-artificial-intelligence-rules-2024-03-13/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Nepal PM wins parliamentary vote of confidence, third in 14 monthsNepal's Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal won a parliamentary vote of confidence on Wednesday, a week after he formed his third coalition in just over a year to head a government which is dominated by the liberal communists. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:43:15 GMT PJZ5D52IPFMPDCBRXK4VLPVIIU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/nepal-pm-wins-parliamentary-vote-confidence-third-14-months-2024-03-13/Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Volkswagen says it has received Chinese government approval for ID.UNYX modelVolkswagen Group China said on Wednesday that the first model by its only majority-controlled joint venture, Volkswagen Anhui, has received Chinese government approval. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:11:41 GMT HFNICGOYVIZ3ILJENEFZPZ4S4 https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/volkswagen-says-it-has-received-chinese-government-approval-idunyx-model-2024-03-13/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Morning Bid: Sidestepping CPI for AI, China wobbles anewA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:05:51 GMT EKEIV5I7ZZJ35DD5MAJUJLSIWM https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-graphics-2024-03-13/Reuters市场美国市场
US House to vote to force ByteDance to divest TikTok or face banThe U.S. House of Representatives plans to vote on a bill on Wednesday that would give TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the U.S. assets of the short-video app used by about 170 million Americans or face a ban. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 10:01:57 GMT VRYMDI464FPTHL46IQLM62FRKY https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-house-vote-force-bytedance-divest-tiktok-or-face-ban-2024-03-13/David Shepardson可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China coal group says US curbs on Russia to keep prices high, hurt exportsTougher U.S. sanctions on Russia's coal firms will keep global prices of high-calorific-value coal high in the near term, affecting a fifth of the latter's coal exports, a Chinese industry group warned on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 08:57:35 GMT W7NBDVZVRFK5THGNJMFQKHNBQ4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/china-coal-group-says-us-curbs-Russia-keep-prices-high-hurt-exports-2024-03-13/Colleen Howe市场商品
